body.name: Portable Rechargeable Fan with Light, 10000mAh Battery Operated Tent Fan with Light & Hook, 270° Pivot, 3 Speeds, Personal USB Table Fan for Camping, Power Outage, Hurricane, Jobsite
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 29 mins
features: 【10000mAh RECHARGEABLE BATTERY】 Powered by 10000mAh rechargeable battery, it can be fully charged in 6-7 hours with 5V2A input via the including type-C cord, and provide 9-300hours duration. Built-in 5V/2A type-C input port for charging the fan, and a 5V/2A USB output port to power other devices. A good saver while camping trip, power outage, hurricane, etc.

【270°Pivots & 2 in 1 Design】2 in 1 personal fan has a hidden hook with 360°rotation, you hang the fan and adjust the right angle. Besides, it is also suitable for indoor use as a desk fan. A 270°pivoting head allows you to instantly cool down in any direction you like. What a great gift.

【EASY TO USE】The fan and LED light are controlled separately. 4 timer indicators (1/2/4/8H) to customize your own cooling and lighting time, and 4 battery indicators show the remaining battery capacity. Long press the sleep mode button to turn off the indicators when you sleep and don’t want it on.

【Useful & Emergency Power Supply 】 Built-in a 5V/2A type-C input port to charge this personal fan and a 5V/2A USB charging port which makes it as a useful power bank. It can be used as outdoor or indoor emergency power to charge your phone, GPS, laptop, or power bank, etc. Note: Please use original cords (2A charging cord) for charging, otherwise it may extend the charging time.

【Gewanolla Brand Worry Free】Always be Responsible and Stand behind. Sturdy and fall-proof, Made of durable ABS material, fall-proof and collision-proof, even at the highest speed, the super stable base can firmly fix the fan, perfect for different outdoor occasions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable fan for camping
reviews.reviewText: Works great, good movement of air. The light comes in handy while camping. Battery life is quite good compared to other rechargeable fans I have used and works well as a power bank to charge other devices. Charges with both USB-A/USB-C and USB-C/USB-C cables.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dry Camping Fan
reviews.reviewText: I used this fan while dry camping in a camper to assist with air flow (on hot days), charge my devices at night and to get in/out of bed (light). The fan is excellent and does what it needs to do and moves air enough to cool down air on a hot day/night for a sleeping area. The battery lasts quite a long time and the different options to hanging it in a tent or sitting it on a counter makes it versatile. The fan does not weight a ton so could easily be packed in if it fell into a necessity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This fan is great!! I bought it to have on hand when we have a power outage and this thing does not disappoint!!! The fan is quiet, the lights are great and the battery is powerful enough that it can be used for hours without worry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fan/light for camping.
reviews.reviewText: Used for camping at the hunting lease during summer. Fan works great, battery lasts a long time. Puts out more than enough light. Haven’t used the usb yet. Takes a while to get fully charged, but battery lasts long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how bright the light is and the fan actually works pretty good I've bought one from Walmart that didn't blow any kinda wind just made a lot of noise but this fan actually works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'd give it 6 stars if I could
reviews.reviewText: I'm doing a 5k mile road trip and camping for 30 days. I've been searching high and low for a good fan. I need one to be able to sleep, as well as move a fair bit of air to keep my tent cool as I get into much hotter climates. This fan has blown me away (unintended pun, but I'm keeping it lol). Not only is it surprisingly powerful for how compact it is, but the battery life is OUTSTANDING. I literally didn't even realize it was a USB-C charging fan. I thought it was another D battery one, so I was pleasantly surprised by the USB C charging port, and oh boy does this thing hold a big charge or what. It'll take you a whole to charge it up via AC if it's drained, but this fan can run on high for like 24 hours straight before it's drained, so if you're running it at night and can charge it during the day, you'll never have to deal with a dead fan. It can also continue to be turned on while charging, so if you're like me and have multiple power banks or a solar setup with an inverter / battery, this is a great combo.10/10 this fan is better than i ever could have hoped for. I'm seriously considering buying a second one lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best product for the price
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 2 of these for camping and for when the lights go out(which is a lot due to storms) and used them for the first time on a weekend long camping trip. One hung on the hook overhead and one we used on a makeshift nightstand. Only one was used to charge our phones and even though it's not a fast charge, it kept everything charged. The fan produces a good bit of air, but I do recommend the bigger your tent or area, the more you will want to buy. I have a 10 person tent and 2 did pretty decent in keeping it cool during the day. Fan that was hanging was kept on all day for 2 days(it got cold at night) and is still sitting at 75%. The one we used to charge everything also stayed on during the day and it's at 25% now. I will be charging both again for the inevitable power outage in our next storm and will be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for camping
reviews.reviewText: Used this for camping, as a tent light and a fan to circulate air in the tent at night. I think I charged my phone with it as well.Works well, only charged it once over a 3 day, two night camp out, as it was down to 25% after the first night. The fan ran all night, so that's to be expected.
Lo compre precisamente para un viaje de campamento y resulto ser bastante útil. Excelente función de ventilador y luz

reviews.reviewTitle: 100 times over, it's the best fan I ever bought
reviews.reviewText: I live in Singapore, so average temperature is 27C or around 80F. I bought this for my office. I found that it's much better than fans multiple times the price (including my much bigger Dyson). The fan flow is huge and the battery lasts 2 weeks for me on full speed. I'm from Australia so my camping perspective on this is valid. I love camping and this fan is beyond what I thought was doable. It's a little larger than some others in the same price and market bracket but we'll worth it. The battery is awesome, the hanger on it is full sized so you wont get stuck mounting it and it swivels in every possible ditection which is a plus from som3 mounted competitors. I use it both hanging and on its stand on a table. This week my eldest has commandeered mine for his bedroom and I need to by another, his older (camping advertised) fan just isn't at the same level. This is completely worth it, I'm about to buy another.
